resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shator's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the shator's darkvision.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The shator has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The shator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The shator's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Poisonous Slime
entries: A creature within 5 feet of the shator is splattered with slime whenever it hits the shator with a melee attack. The creature must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or becoming {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition paralyzed} effect on itself on a success..

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shator makes two claw attacks and one bite. It can substitute its bite for a poisonous spit attack if available.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Poisonous Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The shator exhales poisonous spit in a 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) acid damage on a failed save and becoming {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition paralyzed} effect on itself on a success. The creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage on a successful save.

action.name: Summon Reinforcements (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the shator rolls 1-2 on a {@dice d6} it summons in two Demodand, Farastu|MaBJoV|farastu, a result of 3-4 summons in one {@creature Demodand, shator|MaBJoV|shator}.
